Further documentation

The following manuals provide extensive documentation on the Hitachi H8. They are produced by and available from Hitachi Microsystems; contact your friendly Field Application Engineer for details.

H8/300 Microcomputer User's Manual
Semiconductor Design & Development Center, 1992
